SELECT dt.id as dailyTaskId, dt.title, dth.done_date as doneDate, dth.done_time as doneTime, COALESCE(dth.quota, dt.quota) as quota, CASE WHEN 0 >= dt.quota - dth.done_time THEN 1 ELSE 0 END doneFlg FROM daily_task dt LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM daily_task_history WHERE done_date = #{targetDate}) dth ON dt.id = dth.daily_task_id where username = #{username} AND ( delete_date >= #{targetDate} OR delete_date is null ) AND #{targetDate} >= create_date ORDER BY doneFlg ASC, dt.disp_order ASC, dt.priority ASC, dt.id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO daily_task_history ( daily_task_id , done_date , done_time , quota) VALUES ( #{daily_task_id} , #{done_date} , #{done_time} , #{quota})
